actions.text: Amendment SA 1744 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 182.

Amendment SA 1744 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S5822-5828; text: CR S5822) To prohibit funds to be used to provide housing assistance benefits to individuals convicted of certain felonies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1744 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 182.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1744 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 182.

purpose: To prohibit funds to be used to provide housing assistance benefits to individuals convicted of certain felonies.
